description:
Vovsoft VCF to XLS Converter, a dedicated software tool for Excel binary file format conversion, allows you to import VCF files to Excel.

Vovsoft VCF to XLS Converter, a dedicated software tool for Excel binary file format conversion, allows you to import VCF files to Excel. Designed with simplicity in mind, VCF to XLS Converter can only perform one task: that of extracting the contacts from the input VCF container, then transfer it to a newly created XLS or XLSX file anywhere on your computer. In other words, you just have to select the input VCF file and choose to export it to Excel sheet, all with just a few clicks. The conversion is fast and the process is done completely offline. You are the only controller of your private data. No contact information is sent to internet in any case.

Key Features
* vCard to XLS
* VCF to XLS
* VCF to XLSX (Excel 2007 or later)
* Multi-thread CPU support
* UTF-16, UTF-8 and ANSI support
* Multilingual user-friendly interface
